entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning late this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 60%
